dict.acceptation: 著名的，出名的；〈古〉一流的，极好的；

sent.orig: Famous hi-tech series entrepreneur, he was a investor of the famous venture capital MDS.
sent.trans: 著名的高科技产业系列创业者，回国前是海外著名风险投资公司MDS基金的投资人。

sent.orig: And some famous actors that were famous for the westerns.
sent.trans: 有很多西部片演员风靡一时。

sent.orig: Beijing roast duck is a famous dish unique, famous foreign.
sent.trans: 烤鸭是北京独特的名菜，誉满中外。

sent.orig: Liverpool are just as famous as Barcelona a football club and even more famous trophy-wise.
sent.trans: 从足球的角度来看，利物浦是和巴萨齐名的豪门球队，如果从冠军数上来看，利物浦甚至更强。

sent.orig: Linglong tires were identified as Chinese famous brand products and famous trademarks in China.
sent.trans: 玲珑轮胎被认定为中国名牌产品和中国驰名商标。
